name: Imperivm
description:
Imperivm: The Gallic War is a strategy videogame for PC developed by Haemimont Games, distributed by FX Interactive, produced by Antonio Lucena Ferrero and graphically designed by Jose Luís Díaz. The manual was made by Pablo Aranda and the music by Alejandro Gil. The head of the test was Eduardo Baéz and the test was performed by the FX Interactive test team: Aleksander Zamfirov, Atanas Veselinov, Dimitar Bakalov, Julian Pailov and Tsvetan Angelov.

The game is based on historical events in what is now France.

The player can revive the great conquests of Julius Caesar with the Roman Republic or the heroic defense of the Gauls with battles as important as the battle of Gergovia.
